title: Czech Republic: Citibank Customers Saved More Than 100 Million Crowns Last Year
summary: Prague - Clients of Citibank in the Czech Republic saved over a hundred million crowns in total when paying with Citi credit cards last year. When using Citi credit cards, clients received diverse rewards, bonuses and discounts on their purchases. In the Czech Republic, Citibank offers eight types of credit cards with a different range of benefits.
tag-1: Czech Republic: Citibank Customers Saved More Than 100 Million Crowns Last Year
tag-2: Prague – Clients of Citibank in the Czech Republic saved over a hundred million crowns in total when paying with Citi credit cards last year. When using Citi credit cards, clients received diverse rewards, bonuses and discounts on their purchases. In the Czech Republic, Citibank offers eight types of credit cards with a different range of benefits.
tag-3: "We strive to regularly launch innovative products that meet our busy clients' needs," says George Denisenko, Consumer Lending Head at Citibank in the Czech Republic. "Immediate benefits and discounts are very popular among Citi credit cardholders, and the total save of more than 100 million CZK reflects the strength of our rewards offering. Our clients have benefited from additional discounts when shopping with our partners participating in Citi Club. At the moment, Citi Club includes 200 merchants and service providers with discounts up to 25 percent, and soon we hope to reach 1000 locations."
tag-4: "This reflects our commitment to our customers and continued focus on providing convenient, value added products and services. We are proud to reach this landmark of 100 million crowns in the year Citi celebrates its 200th anniversary," added Bhaskar Katta, Consumer Bank Head at Citibank in the Czech Republic.
tag-5: Bonuses and discounts are given to the holders of the Citi Life credit card, Citi Shopping Card, O2 Citi credit card and Shell MasterCard credit card. The holders of the Citi CSA MasterCard World credit card received more than 100 million miles in 2011. Since the end of last year, most of all new Citi credit cards are being issued with the contactless technology enabling their holders to save time when paying at all merchants having contactless terminals. Moreover, clients can also apply for a contactless sticker to be issued to their credit card.
tag-6: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
